thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com | 3 of 142
thread.title: Toni Stannov

author: Toni Stannov
title: Toni Stannov
text:
I subscribed to an online engineering service using my company card. The following month the subscription was renewed - now using my private credit card. I reported the incident - and got some useless mambo-jumbo back that essentially means they didn't read/understand any of my (pretty simple!) complaint.
I have been with PayPal for, say, 10 years now, and I never saw anything like this before. What's happening to you? Don't you care?
